name: Y.A.N.A. Corporation
description:
Demo of my first (puzzle) game for my first game jam Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

You are one of the researchers of Y. A. N. A. Corporation, named after its founder. You wake up after one of the experiments and find that the complex is almost completely destroyed. The only thing you can do is escape, and no one will help or disrupt you because it seems that you are alone. Or are you?
